Title: Relates to allowing voters to take photographs of themselves and their ballot, or absentee ballot, while in a privacy booth, and to share and disseminate such photographs on social media
Summary: Allows voters to take photographs of themselves and their ballot, or absentee ballot, while in a privacy booth, and to share and disseminate such photographs on social media.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to allowing voters to take photographs of themselves and their ballots while voting
